website_summaries.verdict: A simple, reliable wireless doorbell with plenty of chime options and a few recurring user complaints.
pros: One of the few fully waterproof wireless doorbells
Double-sided tape even sticks to brick, so no need to screw into the wall
cons: Some user complaints about low volume

website_summaries.verdict: Stands out for its wireless range and long battery life, but we don't recommend putting the waterproof claim to too large of a test.
pros: Comes in a choice of black or white
Set includes 2 receivers and a transmitter
Memory function allows receivers to remember settings, even if the power goes out
Included lithium battery has a 3-year lifespan
Features 52 chimes and up to 115 decibels of volume
cons: Despite its claims, some report that this option is not waterproof
Some units lose their transmitter-receiver "pairing" easily, so you have to reset them frequently

customer_reviews.title: Very important instructions...
customer_reviews.text: I don't write reviews often but I better on this doorbell. 1. Use the key to access the battery and REMOVE the clear plastic tab so the battery has contact with the board. 2. Plug in the receiver 3. Hold the volume button down until the red light starts blinking. WHILE HOLDING THE VOLUME BUTTON DOWN, PRESS AND HOLD THE TRANSMITTER BUTTON UNTIL THE RECEIVER STOPS BLINKING AND CHIMES. NOW, they're paired! Good thing I have kids! Works perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy R

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love this Doorbell
customer_reviews.text: Received it today, set up in no time, had fun selecting a sound/song. With 2 receivers I can hear it from all areas of the house. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene D Everett

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!  Works great! Sounds...okay...
customer_reviews.text: The unit works exactly as described and looks great. It's much smaller than I imagined it with the bell units only covering the electrical cover plate beneath they plug into an outlet. The pairing procedure between the button and the bell units is straightforward and easy to accomplish. The only disappointment was the bell tone selection. Only one of the many sounds even reminds me of a doorbell. The rest are all melodies or diddies, all in the same monotonous "instrument." I was hoping for a selection of bells and chimes. A sample of the chimes available should be included in the photos of the unit as a utube clip or something with sound so you can hear the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Warren

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed! I didn't have a doorbell and my house is just under 1500 sqft and this system is great! I can hear it everywhere and it didn't cost me a fortune to install. It's loud, in sync when the door bell rings, and blends in well. The actual bell came with the equipment to anchor it or double-side tape it. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: Lights Up In The Dark And Is Loud Enough To Hear Throughout Our Home
customer_reviews.text: This doorbell is pretty amazing! The part you ring can be attached with double sided tape if you want to move it around or it can be permanently placed with screws. It has a lot of different sounds, mostly animal sounds, which is the downside. There are a few music sounds, but not many. It comes with two speakers so you can place them in whichever room suits you. It is loud and can be heard clearly. It is also weatherproof. The ringer part stays lit so it's easy for someone to find in the dark. I would highly recommend. It is definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Rachelle Cobb

customer_reviews.title: It only lasted 6 months
customer_reviews.text: This product only lasted from August 30th 2017 until February 9,2018. The battery is supposed to last for 3 years. The outside door bell doesn't work. The bell box that's plugged in works when you push the button on the box. When I went tp return it, it said that it can't be returned after Sept 30th. What is that all about. Sounds like a scam. Not a good business.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: This was everything as described. It was easy to set up. I liked the variety of chimes/music/sounds. The volume is easy to control. I screwed it into the wall outside my front door - very easy to do. It is good quality. One of the selling points for me is when the power goes out I don't have to re-prograam it. It looks nice outside and inside too. Very, very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Bunch

customer_reviews.title: Does not work reliably
customer_reviews.text: This worked while the doorbell was indoors during setup. As soon as the doorbell was installed outside it rarely worked. The distance from the the doorbell to the receiver was very short. I'm guessing the signal couldn't reliably go through our brick walls. Either way we decided to return the item.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen McKinney

customer_reviews.title: IP 55 rating is questionable.
customer_reviews.text: The IP 55 rating was compromised in less than three months in an outdoor application. The installation by the front gate exposed the unit to the elements of wind, rain, and sun. A few days ago the unit stopped transmitting. Upon opening the transmitter, condensation and corrosion was found as shown in the photo. Hopefully a warranty claim will be a positive experience, however there is now doubt in its IP 55 rating.
customer_reviews.author: RDB

customer_reviews.title: A cost effective method of making sure you hear the doorbell.
customer_reviews.text: We've used these for a few weeks now and they work perfectly. One is installed toward the back of the house (about 40 feet away), and the other in an office (perhaps 30 feet away). Being able to hear the doorbell in different parts of the house is a definite plus. Instructions for pairing the transmitter (the button beside the door) and the receivers are easy to follow and yes, there are many 'ringtone' options, but you will have to cycle through them in order to choose. Each receiver can be set to a different ringtone and a different volume. For a unit with two receivers, this is a competitive price.
customer_reviews.author: Person to Person Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Not Waterproof as stated
customer_reviews.text: I bought this doorbell and was excited with how easy it was to set up and install. Sadly, IT IS NOT WATERPROOF though. Installed it on our front porch that is actually covered. It rained hard and water got to the doorbell and I stopped working only a couple weeks later!! I opened it up to see to replace the battery and it was all rusted and corroded. Do not buy
customer_reviews.author: NC

customer_reviews.title: If you have a steel door forget this product.
customer_reviews.text: I wish that I could give a good review. The product looks great. The product installs with ease. The doorbell selection of tones is fun. HOwever, I finally learned that when my door is closed (as it should be) the wireless does not penetrate through a steel door. Pretty funny as I kept asking people if they were ringing the bell. I would go to the door and ring the bell with the door open and clearly hear the bell. It took quite some time to figure out that it would not work. I guess I don't get many visitors. Useless.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Blumberg

customer_reviews.title: Don't follow sticker instructions!
customer_reviews.text: Got it today. Works great. Tip: Don't follow instructions on sticker that say "slide up" on the back of the transmitter. That's complete B.S. Instead, use the little metal "key" inside the clear bag to pry apart the back cover. Pros: - Chimes Loud - Awesome range (even through 18" poured block - 3 stories up) - Easy to setup (barring you didn't follow sticker instructions) - about 3 minutes to pair and place all Cons: - Stupid sticker instructions will cause you to lose a fingernail in an attempt to slide something up that doesn't slide. 5 Star - because it's worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Cash

customer_reviews.title: Awesome doorbell easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Awesome doorbell. Absolutely love it and highly recommend to anybody who wants a nice sleek simple easy to use doorbell. Great addition to home. It has so many music options you are bound to find something you like
customer_reviews.author: RandomBoringReviews

customer_reviews.title: Doorbell Button Quit Working - 18 Mos
customer_reviews.text: The button on this doorbell lasted us about 18 months. Loved the doorbell and the chimes had good range and performed exactly as we had hoped. It stopped working so I replaced the battery but no fix. I took it apart and found the button actuator on the circuit board would activate the chime intermittently, like once every 5 or 6 clicks. I was hoping to be able to buy a new button only but don't see that option. I reached out to the manufacturer to see what can be done.
customer_reviews.author: K. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Must have item.
customer_reviews.text: I gave it as a gift for my brother, as I had to call him over the phone every time I was in front of his house 😒. Him and my sister in law are pretty happy with the product, sounds loud (they are only using one, as for their house is more than enough) and I couldn’t be happier as I don’t have to be calling him anymore and I don’t have to wait long time for them to open the door 😎. This is a good product, the price is very good (in my opinion) for the features and the value that it brings to your house.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel J. Peguero

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good wireless door bell and the price is right!
customer_reviews.text: This wireless door bell arrived on time and set up was very simple following the enclosed directions. This door bell is compact but emits loud enough sound to hear it ring through all of the rooms in our single level home. I like the ring options very much. Glad I chose this wireless door bell to replace my old one.
customer_reviews.author: storm

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my office thanks to customer support
customer_reviews.text: Initially didn't work but good customer support helped me get it working. The good thing about this doorbell is that it works in my office through several walls and over 100 feet away. When I initially received it, I could not get the transmitter to work. Avantek (Claybox) has good customer support and suggested that I don't push the battery all the way into the slot, but leave it partially (about 1 mm) out inside the body of the transmitter (see photo). This worked and now we are up and running. I tried the Sadotek doorbell before this and it didn't work at all, so I'm overall happy now with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: mmii

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation-easy pairing!
customer_reviews.text: Installation was so easy ! The default Chime of Ding Dong is the best tune for our Miniature Poodle and Miniature Maltese dog not to bark when doorbell is rung. Purchased 2 sets—one for front door and the other for back slightly door—2 plug receivers were set upstairs (home office and Loft) 2 extra plug receivers were set in master bedroom and breakfast nook — our home is 3200 square feet
customer_reviews.author: Ms Yoli - Texas Frequent Customer

customer_reviews.title: transmitter problem
customer_reviews.text: Transmitter works intermittently right out of the box, had to buy fresh batteries to troubleshoot. it works better when you hold the transmitter in your hand along the edges but once holding it inside your hand or attach it to the back plate on the wall then it goes dead even at 10 feet away while at other times it can activate the receiver at 50 feet away, very unreliable. It never worked attached together and installed on the wall. returned.
customer_reviews.author: Pier

customer_reviews.title: Simply doesn't work (possible faulty unit)
customer_reviews.text: Edit: I'm leaving my original review below, but revising up from 1 star. The item I received was likely faulty, and the customer service from the vendor was extremely responsive. Doesn't really work. The transmitter (doorbell) only intermittently causes the receiver to chime even from very close range. It fails reliably (100%) if you press and hold for a long time (which many people do with doorbells) and if you just click it quickly it works about 10% of the time. The only thing worse than not having a doorbell is having one that people THINK works but doesn't
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: Super easy install. Peel and stick the door bell where ever you need it and plug in the receivers where you need to hear them most. I chose in my bathroom and my living room.. my apartment has a long 900 sq ft floor plan with the door mostly surrounded by walls so knocks are hard to hear. It's fairly loud, but you can change the volume and fortunately or unfortunately you can change the ring from a simple "ding dong" to a goats "bah"... i have no idea who would want that but incase that's what you're looking for this is perfect
customer_reviews.author: christine

customer_reviews.title: Range is not even 50 ft, let alone 1300 ft.
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so their description of 1312 ft range has to mean square feet. I put one in the house and one in the back yard by my pool, maybe 50-60 feet away. It doesn't reach it. I didn't believe the 1300 ft claim when I bought it, but was thinking it should at least reach the back yard. It doesn't. Most of the rings are super obnoxious. They could have offered 5 and it would have been just as good. Too many annoying tunes. Anyway, would work fine for a small home, but who needs 2 receivers in a small home anyway. So my review is just marginal, because the product was inaccurate in its description.
customer_reviews.author: JackbNymbull

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. Support sucks. 20 degrees outside, and the button on the doorbell freezes to the point where you cannot push it in. Installed this in summer time. Lasted less than 3 weeks before I had issues connecting it with the speakers. Constantly had to pair the door bell with speakers. This product is not waterproof, and will not work down to -4 deg as the description states. Half a dozen emails back and forth with manufacturer with still no resolution.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Does what it needs too
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a simple doorbell as our house didn't have one when we moved in and I didn't want to hard wire a door bell. We looked into getting a more sophisticated doorbell with a camera but decided against it. I just wanted something simple. Family comes over, pushes the button, and the doorbell rings, that's it. This is just that. It's super easy to set up. You basically just adhere the transmitter outside your door and plug the receiver into the wall. It comes with everything you need, including battery. You can chose between different chimes as well as the volume. I recommend this product to anyone looking for a simple no fuss doorbell.
customer_reviews.author: Dimitri

customer_reviews.title: NOT waterproof
customer_reviews.text: NOT waterproof. Worked fine for a few months but button box is NOT waterproof and it corroded inside.
customer_reviews.author: Kitz

customer_reviews.title: Door bell button only last a little over a year
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this door bell set would last a lot longer but it seems that the door bell itself only lasted a little over a year. I found that the clear plastic of the button touching the electric board actually melted a little causing the button press to be uneven and sticking to the board which the button doesn't really work anymore since it cannot be depressed anymore. Since they don't sell the button by itself, you will have to buy an entirely new set. Giving it 2 stars since it did last over a year and worked well when it was working.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Great doorbell
customer_reviews.text: Bought this doorbell because our wired one wasn't cutting it, whoever installed it put the speaker right on the other side of the door so if you were in any other part of the house you wouldn't hear the doorbell. Bought the one with two speakers so we could have one upstairs and one in the basement and now we have no issues. Hardest part of installation was figuring out what breaker my wired doorbell was on so I could disconnect it, after that it was a no-brainer.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Sneed

customer_reviews.title: Worked great when first installed then started going off randomly
customer_reviews.text: I was super pleased when I first received and installed the doorbell. Solved a distance / wiring issue for us. It worked fine and I didn't mind the sounds - I just used the standard doorbell sound. It worked great with both receiver units connecting and sounding when activated. Problem solved... Oops! Then - just after the return window closed, the receiver units started activating randomly. I think the doorbell outdoor unit was not so waterproof as advertised. Now it's a doorstop. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: LFB

customer_reviews.title: AVANTEK D-3B Waterproof Door Chime Kit
customer_reviews.text: Very simple to install and operate. Looks and sounds good too! I like the strong transmission to the receivers that I positioned upstairs and downstairs in my house. They never fail to ring when the button is pushed. I know through experience that some wireless doorbells are not as reliable. It sucks when you're expecting someone and they think you're not home because they ring once or twice and nothing happens. No fear of that with this kit.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Tiangco

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit, but too quiet for those with significant hearing loss.
customer_reviews.text: My mother was not hearing her doorbell anymore so we installed these around her house. They were very easy to install. Two things to note. 1) The flashing alert light is hopelessly dim. It is nothing more than a blue LED. Ylou would have to be staring at it to see it. 2) The highest volume is still not very high for someone with impaired hearing. These will work for a while and then as her hearing gets worst, we will have to replace with a much louder system.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick S. Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: the product looks nice and has a good selection of tones
customer_reviews.text: Ok, the product looks nice and has a good selection of tones. The problem is we are using this at our company and it barely works through the cinder block walls into the building. Then if we have inside another room within the building forget about it. And this is barely 50' away from where we have the transmitter mounted outside the door. wish we would have spent the money on a better system. Now with that said, this would probably be just fine and even good for a residential home.
customer_reviews.author: Puga

customer_reviews.title: Part was defective.
customer_reviews.text: Received the Avantek wireless doorbell today but unfortunately the button didn't light up when I pushed it nor did it play the chimes, etc. At first I thought maybe it was the battery that came with the unit. You have to remove a small clear plastic cover from the battery which I did. So I tried a new battery (same type as original battery), but the button still wouldn't work. It was defective. Too bad because the plug in unit worked well (it plays when you first plug it in and do the adjusting of the loudness and assortment of sounds) and was loud and clear. This would have been a great doorbell if the button part had worked.
customer_reviews.author: Inspector 12

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to setup and use!
customer_reviews.text: This couldn't be easier to use. Open the box, plug the chimes in, mount the doorbell and it's working in under 10 minutes. Only gave this a 4 star rating because for all the chimes it has, there really isn't just a ding-dong sound. There's horses neigh'ing, alien spacecraft noises, EDM type noises, but not just a simple ding-dong. Somewhat disappointing since I don't want my house to sound like a video game when someone rings the doorbell.

customer_reviews.title: A lot of bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: I have a traditional knocker on the door, which is annoying even for me at times. It's so darn bulky and disrespectful lol. So, I browsed and ordered this wireless doorbell and let me tell you, it's a great purchase! Setup takes under 5 minutes and if you're not especially tech savvy, you'll love how easy it is. There are a multitude of chimes/music for you to choose from, but the bonus in my opinion, is the backlight when someone rings the doorbell. Many of the other wireless doorbells I browsed on Amazon, did not have this feature. Win-win, people! Don't hesitate to purchase this one.
customer_reviews.author: ShoeDiva

customer_reviews.title: Easy install and fun to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product to replace a non-working traditional wired system for my niece. Installation is a no-brainer. Hardest part of the install was deciding which one of the 52 different "chimes" to select. I'm betting she will change the tunes based on the season/holiday. Range is excellent, even in a large, 2 story house. Volume easy to adjust from soft to really loud. I liked product so much, I bought a second set for my own house. Ripped out the old wired system and installed this. However, my dog informed me the "barking dog" sound effect was not acceptable. Neither was the "whining cat".
customer_reviews.author: Jim H.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful doorbell for the hard of hearing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this doorbell for my mother-in-law who is hard of hearing. There are two units in the set that can be placed at different locations throughout the house. The sounds are loud and clear when the button is pressed. She has no problem hearing them since I placed one unit in her bedroom and one in her living room where she spends most of her time. Hint: One thing that I found was to set both units to the same tune. That way it's like stereo when the button is pressed. Different tunes played at the same time can cause confusion I found.
customer_reviews.author: Byter

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 2 years ago, it stopped working a few months ago, but it was just a dead battery. Replaced the battery and it works fine, it installed right over the spot the old door bell was. My biggest complaint is it is not loud enough! Which might be good in some houses, lets the kids sleep and all, but with the 2 receivers spread out you need to be in that room, or right next to that room, AND have good hearing to hear these. Even on the loudest setting, we have resorted to finding the longest most annoying sound we can, and setting it on that, hoping someone hears it before whoever is ringing, leaves.
customer_reviews.author: Ashra

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase - excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the good reviews & it did not disappoint. Default chime is a good choice, as it's very much like a standard/familiar doorbell chime. Adhesive is very good on the product. I wanted to point out that it does not have an LED light on it constantly. It does flash a blue LED indication when you push the button however.
customer_reviews.author: Kat and Mikey

customer_reviews.title: Works well, most of the ring options are too long
customer_reviews.text: The doorbell in our townhouse broke. Instead of figuring out the old wiring from the 70's my handy man suggested putting up a wireless one. Took about 5 min or less to install. Range was good and works like a charm. The only issue,as others have mentioned, is the lack of short bell options. There are so many options. But only 1 or 2 that I consider viable. I have a small home. Some of the bells are so long I could be as far from the door as possible when it rings and get to the door before it was done ringing.
customer_reviews.author: ALfromTX

customer_reviews.title: My first wireless doorbell and I love it
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace my old wired doorbell and I found most products nowadays are wireless. I opted for this kit because of its range and sleek look. Install was a breeze using the 3M adhesive along with mounting screws that came with it. The button isn't going anywhere. I mounted on siding and the combination of screws and tape make this a solid mounting. The bell itself plugs into an outlet so it won't lose power. My only complaint is there are a lot of long melodies (holiday songs). I'm a simple bell kind of person so I don't care for the cutesy ones. It's good to have options I suppose. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: JJ Farias

customer_reviews.title: An easy to install, surprisingly functional bell
customer_reviews.text: So I live in Washington, and I bought an old, weird house with no functional doorbell. I will likely wire one in, sometime in the future, but I needed a working doorbell immediately. I decided to give this a shot, but I had reservations...I live in a 7200 sq ft building, with the living space being upstairs; my concern was that the distance would be too much. This set, with two receivers and one doorbell, works perfectly. We positioned one receiver downstairs, and ine upstairs in the entry hall. It is loud, functional, effective, and has a number of different sounds and melodies to choose from. I am pleasantly surprised at how well this actually works.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Now my invalid mother can "call" me with ease.
customer_reviews.text: So many various sounds to choose from is fun. I use this for my invalid mother who lives with me. She gets the button and I have one unit upstairs and one unit downstairs. It's easy for her to "call" me when she needs something. I had tried to give her a whistle to use, but she is too weak to blow hard enough into the whistle. This solves the problem beautifully!
customer_reviews.author: Kit March

customer_reviews.title: It has many annoying chines b
customer_reviews.text: It's a budget personalised doorbell. They can't actually make my real doorbell work right for some reason so I needed a cheap option that's also black because that's my color scheme and in my opinion 99% of the sounds r annoying Be useless but there r a few cool ones and that's all u really need. I've settled on 1 for quite a while now but I think there r 3 or 4 sounds I approve of and may switch at some point The only thing stopping me is I have to go 1 by 1 through all the annoying ones to get to the good ones. Oh well, it was affordable and works.
customer_reviews.author: VOID

customer_reviews.title: Could not connect doorbell & receivers
customer_reviews.text: Thought I would try this doorbell because it had good reviews. Very disappointed in that it did not work. I followed the directions that were provided & the doorbell & receivers were not able to connect to each other. I even bought new batteries for the doorbell, thinking the supplied battery was drained. Nope. Still no connection. I will be returning this unit & buy another brand. The only positive I can think of is the quick shipping by Amazon, thus the one star.
customer_reviews.author: Moua Product reviews

customer_reviews.title: Quick, Easy, and very useful.
customer_reviews.text: Nice and easy setup. A whole bunch of chimes to choose from. It's a nice gift for someone who doesn't have a wired doorbell, or for someone who wants to make sure doorbells (in general) are worth it. The receiver is plug and play; the transmitter is waterproof and temperature resistant, so in the cold Northeast it's just fine sitting outside our side door. It's attached to vinyl siding through a strong adhesive that won't damage the siding either, so it's a win-win. I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Total

customer_reviews.title: Not dependable
customer_reviews.text: I loved this doorbell for 2 months then it stopped working. I tried to re sync it to the battery but it didn’t work. I messaged the company over 5 days ago with no reply. I can no longer recommend this product. Sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Lanette C.

customer_reviews.title: Followed the directions and paired one receiver. Doorbell system ...
customer_reviews.text: Followed the directions and paired one receiver. Doorbell system very unreliable. From 15 feet away and with no obstructions in between it would sometimes take 15 or more pushes of the transmitter to get the receiver to chime. Other times it might take 3 -5. Obviously it needs to work on each push of the transmitter. Unfortunately I have to send it back and look for another product. I wish it would have worked as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If your next door neighbor has one beware !
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this wireless doorbell is great EXCEPT.... You cannot change the transmitter frequency so if your next door neighbor has this model, you will be hearing your doorbell every time someone pushes your neighbors button and he will hear his doorbell go off every time someone pushes your button, so scope out your neighbors on either side of you to make sure either one does not have this same model (unless they are more than 2,000 feet away) otherwise you and your neighbor will be pushing the wrong buttons... and I don't mean doorbell buttons.
customer_reviews.author: K Adams

customer_reviews.title: The transmitter battery died in two days because the illuminating ...
customer_reviews.text: The transmitter battery died in two days because the illuminating light stays on on the transmitter. If i didn't throw away the packaging i would have sent it right back.
customer_reviews.author: David Fred

customer_reviews.title: I have serious doubts about it being waterproof or even resistant
customer_reviews.text: The ringer/chime set is similar to other brands. How the button looks and how the LEDS light up are the only real difference. The other specs all appear to be virtually the same. I don't believe it will even be water resistant because there is no seal on the battery panel and if you hard mount it you'll drill through the battery panel. Lucky for me, this install despite the outdoor location, I have several feet of cover. Meaning it is highly unlike to have any direct contact with water.
customer_reviews.author: W. Sung

customer_reviews.title: Great! 0 install time. Annoying midis, still awesome
customer_reviews.text: Previous review below, it was awesome for 3 weeks And then it stopped working forever. Thought maybe the battery was dead, no such luck. I had it sent to Colombia so I can't ship it back for a replacement unfortunately so I'm giving it 1 star for defectiveness Awesome, I live in a 3400sqft concrete apartment. My regular door bell doesnt even ring upstairs so I replaced it with this. There is no install time, peel, stick, plug, done. The tones are horrible so I opted for straight doorbell but it works through all my steel reinforced doors and rings in my office with 1ft thick concrete walls on the other side of the house. Best buy ever
customer_reviews.author: Project Venecia

customer_reviews.title: Battery dead on 1st order, hoping for better on replacement
customer_reviews.text: Received it quickly but when I installed it, it too me an hour of reading the VERY small print with not enough instructions, it turned out the battery was dead on the transmitter. The instructions said to remove a protective film from the battery before use. There was NO protective film. The receivers were working fine and the volume and types of sound were excellent. Even my "I'm not deaf" father could hear them. Returned it for a replacement. Crossed my fingers that it will work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kekaha Caregiver

customer_reviews.title: Good stylish look. Quick delivery, Easy to install and set up
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit sceptical when placed the order but was pleasantly surprised. The wireless doorbell kit came quick, it was super easy to install and set up. It came with 2 options- one to drill it in the wall and the other to attach with a sticky thing that goes to the wall. My husband was surprised I got it all set up and installed before he came home. The One thing I would chance is to add more melodies with pleasant sounds. The current options are not the most popular yet I still found one I like.
customer_reviews.author: Petya Esho

customer_reviews.title: One of the receivers doesn't always work
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because we work from home and our offices are in the basement. We can't hear anyone knock at the door. We put the transmitter on the front door. One receiver is in the upstairs hallway and the other in my office. The receiver in the upstairs hallway does not always work when the button is pressed but the one in the office will chime. One time there was about a 30 second delay before it chimed. It's strange because it's the receiver which is closer to the transmitter.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Corcoran

customer_reviews.title: It works, easy installation, no wiring
customer_reviews.text: It works, does exactly what it is supposed to. My doorbell wiring is messed up so I needed to purchase one of these, no wiring required. Installation was a breeze. Thing is, all the ringtones are unpleasant in my opinion. The original chime is the best. Of all the tones they have to choose from, only one is bearable. The rest are kind of tacky. Anyway, it does the job, however I will be purchasing a ring chime to go with my ring doorbell. I should have returned it but the return window ended.
customer_reviews.author: Heaven

customer_reviews.title: fixed once, second time failed
customer_reviews.text: Well I bought this in May of 2017, it stopped working about 5 months after I put it up, I found one of the tabs inside broke, wasn't making contact. And now again the tab is separated. I had it soldered the first time. just a weak design.. If it were not for that it would probably be good to go..
customer_reviews.author: Thistle

customer_reviews.title: ALL SEEMS GOOD BUT OH, THE MANUAL
customer_reviews.text: THANK HEAVENS I'D INSTALLED AN EARLIER ELECTRONIC DOORBELL; THE BATTERY DIED OR RAIN GOT IT AFTER 3 YEARS, A DORO AND IT WORKED WELL. I THINK I SET IT UP IN JUST A FEW MINUTE. BUT NOT THIS ONE. THE MANUAL IS PRINTED IN SPIDERWEB TYPE, I HAD TO FINALLY JUST JOT DOWN EVERYTHING IN BLACK INK FOR MYSELF AFTER STRAINING TO SEE WITH A MAGNIFYING GLASS. IT MADE ME SO CROSS IT TOOK ME DAYS TO SET THIS UP! I AM OLD. IT SEEMS TO WORK WELL AND I CAN HEAR THE TWO RECEIVERS WELL.
customer_reviews.author: Linn

customer_reviews.title: This actually works!
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered a wireless doorbell that cost almost $100.00 and it wouldn't consistently work. Sometimes it did and other times wouldn't ring. I purchased this wireless doorbell with 2 speakers thinking I wanted to make sure I heard it through my house. I have a small house so put one ringer in my office and one in the kitchen. This doorbell hasn't failed me yet and works great! Very good product for the money and would recommend it to anyone looking for a doorbell when they can't hard-wire one in.
customer_reviews.author: Canadian Shar

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to setup!!
customer_reviews.text: The item says its waterproof and looks like it should be but I haven't tested or tried it out yet. So far we are very happy with the product but only time will tell the truth as to if it is waterproof and what kind of durability it has. Will hopefully be able to update my review later???
customer_reviews.author: Mike W.

customer_reviews.title: It does the job and it works
customer_reviews.text: It does what Is meant for, the small unit where you press the button for the device to ring can be attached to anything that can hold it by using the double adhesive tape included, I put mine on the metal screen door. Many ringers to choose from and different volume controls. It is not Illuminated and I will assume It is to have the battery last longer, makes sense. It does however have 2 or 3 Blue lights flash a couple of times when you press the door bell.
customer_reviews.author: BlueKnightX

customer_reviews.title: If the second bell doesn't make a sound, does anyone hear it?
customer_reviews.text: Bell does not go off in our furthest room unless you press on the button directly. Only my wife presses directly when we test it- then it works. Seems UPS and other delivery persons do not properly push the button with a great deal of forethought. You hear their pushes at the first bell, but not the second. If they had said it only works with a direct hit, they would have been more accurate, and I could have given it at least one more star.
customer_reviews.author: hellojoe

customer_reviews.title: Solved our door bell issue for an afforable price
customer_reviews.text: Our house is older and the wiring to our door bell was faulty and hard to get to with the slope of our roof. We attached the door bell button with screws and simply placed the ringers inside accordingly. I really recommend this door bell for it's ease and simplicity. My only complaint is that the light on the doorbell button only lights up when its pushed. I would prefer that it was lit up at night time so that visitors can see it in the darkness. Let 👇 me know if this review helped. ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Tex

customer_reviews.title: Not happy.
customer_reviews.text: Only one worked and the other has to be very close. Definitely not 1000 feet. Had to mount it outside the cover because signal could not reach the house if under the cover of our post that holds the doorbell outside our gate. Even with all that it only works half the time. Less than 100 feet to where it was plugged into house at closest possible spot in a bedroom. The living room was to far. Very disappointed and currently shopping for a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Michael VanHeusen

customer_reviews.title: Works well-easy install
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our commercial business office and our crew guys use it like a toy. They get a great kick out of seeing an old man spring from his chair every 10 seconds to let them in, even though we have a door exclusively for them. I guess they think I need to lose weight. That being said, this unit performs as stated and then some. You can imagine the abuse 60 guys give this unit on a daily basis and it's still working like a champ. Plug it in and you're done!
customer_reviews.author: bsnydersvc

customer_reviews.title: Great Doorbell - Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for my wife's father (92 years old) b/c he was having issues with his present battery unit and he is rather hard of hearing. It is GREAT! While the sound quality isn't stellar (I'm a professional musician) it is definitely loud enough when we plugged one unit into his dinning room and one in the bathroom close to his bedroom. It doesn't matter where in his house he is, he can hear it and will never miss the door again. Good quality workmanship and great flexibility in the volume and different choices of "ringers." I would highly recommend this doorbell.
customer_reviews.author: LTD

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, works great, fast delivery.
customer_reviews.text: I opted to mount my button with two optional screws instead of the stick on strip. Button looks quality, nice rubber gasket seal, and even lights up when pressed. The two receivers simple plug in any wall outlet. The receivers have a test button to hear current chime and up/down buttons like volume on a cell phone to select other chimes. No pairing or configuring, just plug them in, activate battery, and it works. Instructions are micro print though.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Fester

customer_reviews.title: Distance not acurate
customer_reviews.text: Item is very easy to install and setup. I didn't even have to sync it. The distance that the receiver works is very inaccurate. I placed the receiver in my house and gave my father-in-law the button so he could use it if he needed to. He lives exactly 450 feet from our house, across the street. The receiver is on an outside wall. It will not reach. I plugged the receiver in an extension cord and placed it on my porch outside of the house and it worked. Not sure where they got 1300 feet from, but that is not accurate.
customer_reviews.author: L. Messer

customer_reviews.title: Has survived winter
customer_reviews.text: This cheap doorbell has survived a cold Northeast winter with its double sided tape. It rings when pressed that’s all there is to know. Loud and enough sounds to go through and have one you like. It’s what you want if you just need a cheap working wireless doorbell.
customer_reviews.author: J. Roman

customer_reviews.title: It's a cheap doorbell, and... it works.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had any issues. I have one speaker/receiver in my upstairs bedroom, and one in our stairwell between the kitchen and the basement. It has a bunch of tones, and the only really "negative" about this is that you can only switch tones in a single direction... if that makes sense. If you accidentally push the button to the next tone, instead of pressing a "back" button you have to cycle through all the tones. Big whoop. If you don't want to break the bank, buy this. If you're annoyed because it seems cheap, that's on you.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: I live on the Oregon Coast.... ...
customer_reviews.text: I live on the Oregon Coast......lots of rain! This product is advertised as WATERPROOF, that is why I purchased it. After 1.5 months of installation, the water destroyed the battery, and yes the weatherproof gasket was installed properly. Warranty period should have been an eye opener. It is not repairable. Lesson learned. Dont buy from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased - was received next day - fast. Unfortunately it would not pair up... even bought a new battery thinking it was a dead battery still would not pair up... tried and tried.. unfortunately I had to return/exchange it for another one which also came the next day.. the 2nd one that came was easy.. I guess the 1st was defective.. it happens. For $19.99 it's a Bargain. Works well so far.. it was easy really to install. Diffidently recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I had by another company and although they guaranteed it for three years, the part that went south wasn't covered. As my luck would have it, I would have to pay to have another set delivered. I chose not to replace the broken one with the same brand. I've only had this set for a few months it works great and I really like how there are two receivers in this set. I set one up front and the other on the back side of the house. They both work great and now we can hear the doorbell in any room of the house
customer_reviews.author: Lab Rat

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good deal
customer_reviews.text: I bought this setup so that I could post the chimes throughout my house and hit the doorbell button when I need my kiddos to be quiet (when I'm in my home-office and on the phone). It does the trick. I wish it would go just a bit louder, but I have a 4,000sf house, so my needs might not be what most peoples' are. I can't speak to the weatherproof-ness of the product(s) or speak to the receptivity of the chimes from the button much, but it seems to be a good deal. As always, glad for Amazon. I placed the order from my desk, and two days later I have it installed in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for money
customer_reviews.text: Considering how cheap this doorbell is I’m surprised by the quality. I have one upstairs, and one in the kitchen. Both remote chimes work perfectly and are loud. There’s about 50 or so different sounds to choose from and the quality is very good. It’s extremely easy to setup. I haven’t had any issues and would recommend it to anyone. I’d definitely get the double chime if you have a large house but a single one might work as well, but for the price I’d just get 2.
customer_reviews.author: MilkoChicago

customer_reviews.title: awesome product.
customer_reviews.text: this by far is the best doorbell i have bought and tried and its water proof and dust proof. I love the fact you can pick and door bell sound and different on each on. I showed it to my friends and they had mr order for there homes as well. I would buy again and again. good price and easy to install and pair.
customer_reviews.author: art

customer_reviews.title: Easy, Practical, Good Replacement
customer_reviews.text: So far it couldn't be easier. Setup took only a quick few minutes. Was longer looking for the screwdriver than actually installing the door bell button. Two units provide good volume and plenty of coverage. Replace my old, hard to hear, wired door bell in minutes. So far, very pleased, lots of ring tones to choose from, adjustable volume control. Does take up a spot on an outlet for the ringers.
customer_reviews.author: Siamese Lover

customer_reviews.title: Good Value, Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I live in an area where torrential rains are common during the summer. The outside button is installed at the front gate, not the front door. It has no protection at all from the elements, no porch, no overhang, nothing. When it rains, it gets drenched. No problems so far. The receiver has many different sounds. Most are not what I would want to hear when someone rings the bell but no matter. It works very well. There are a few Christmas themed alerts which is a nice touch. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: John Davis

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Doorbell!
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a doorbell that didn't need special wiring, and this one was PERFECT for our needs! Our home is small and it's very easy to hear this product from anywhere in the house! Love that you can program all types of chiming sounds! We love this!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Krutz

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: So far, we are very happy with this purchase. The doorbell button comes with an adhesive pad to adhere it to the outside of the house. It seems to be very sturdy, but I will update my review if anything changes. The receiver inside the house is a wall plug that seems very sturdy. There are many doorbell sound options that come with this doorbell, but most of them are very cheesy, or they are very long. We just opted to set it to use a normal doorbell sound.
customer_reviews.author: Marni

customer_reviews.title: Tones could be better
customer_reviews.text: This is super easy to install right out of the box. The tones are pretty rough and annoying. I wish there were more simple or classic tones. My toddler loves the animals tones but then he goes and removes the ringer from the wall, rendering the doorbell useless. I would place it higher off the ground if possible. I like that there are two receivers for different floors of the house.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick R

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this about a month and so far the battery hasn't failed.....the Lithium 2032 has a far better life span than the typical alkaline batteries do, that's why I bought this one. The AVANTEK Door Chime comes with two receivers which can be placed anywhere in my home, it has quite a good choice of chimes to choose from and the sound quality is very good, however, I would have liked one with an justifiable volume control, but the sound level it's set at is sufficient!
customer_reviews.author: RangeRover

customer_reviews.title: As advertised, does the job, good quality and value, modestly priced
customer_reviews.text: We needed a new front doorbell and this seemed to fit the bill; it arrived well packaged and included useful instructions; there are dozens of ring options and ringer volume is easily adjusted; the receivers and doorbell were easily paired and we applied the doorbell on the wall over the previous doorbell opening utilizing the sticky tape provided (saving the screws that it came with); we plugged in the two receivers in strategic locations on our main floor and downstairs (previously our doorbell could not be heard downstairs so having the extra one is nice); we recommend the product and the price is right.
customer_reviews.author: ddp pdx

customer_reviews.title: It's a Working Wireless Doorbell.
customer_reviews.text: Wireless doorbell has arrived! It looks very much like the picture. It's size square, it's color milk white, and at the center is a functional button engraved with blue school bell. Well, it's a doorbell without wires and it works. Installation was a snap. Plug-in each speaker to an outlet and use the supplied adhesive strip on the doorbell, you now have a working front door notification system. After several months of living in the changing elements and a few rain storms, I will report back on how weather proof it truly is.
customer_reviews.author: Tech Henry

customer_reviews.title: Never miss a delivery or someone at door again!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son. He works from home in his basement so frequently missed FedEx or UPS deliveries because he couldn't hear a knock on his door. Now he has one ringer in the basement and one in the back bedroom. Problem solved! He never misses a delivery or a person at his door. My sister also has this same door bell and has been very pleased with it. In fact, she recommended it to me.
customer_reviews.author: Judy M. Ownby

customer_reviews.title: Nice product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Good range and easy to install. The only downside is that so many of the "ring-tones" are barnyard animal noises - I mean a whole lot of them are barn yard animal noises! I'd have preferred actual and useful ringtones of various types. Product loses a star because of this shortcoming.
customer_reviews.author: Farley

customer_reviews.title: a great doorbell
customer_reviews.text: This is a way better than having to rewire the house. My concrete block house was built in the 1950's and the doorbell is in the kitchen. Added a family room onto the back of the house and could never hear the door bell. Now, problem solved with a bell in the living room and another in the family room. Super easy to install by a senior citizen. Stuck it on the concrete block and plugged in the receivers... works great!
customer_reviews.author: Bill K.

customer_reviews.title: Good Solution
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace a traditional wired doorbell. Either the wiring or the transformer had gone bad. Purchased this, plugged the receiver into a wall outlet near my front door and attached the button in the location of the old unit. Less than 10 minutes to install and a couple of minutes to review all of the optional ring-tones. Easy. Done. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: wrpercival

customer_reviews.title: The best wireless doorbell I've ever used!
customer_reviews.text: True to the word - works well through a few walls and at longer distances than other bells I've tried. The secondary remote station is great because now I can hear the bell in my backyard! Easy install - done in less than 5 minutes start to finish. It took longer to remove my non-working doorbell! The use of the button battery is the best option - I won't have to change it for probably 2 years. Truly great product!
customer_reviews.author: VinCampbell

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and connect
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I needed an extra bell in my sun room, it was really easy to install, I removed the old bell button, tucked in the wires in the hole and install the new one on top. It took me like 15 minutes and I liked it so far, it has a bunch of musical tones that I don't use. It has good volume and think will last for awhile. I will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -Easy to install -Set up took a minute -Lots of tunes to choose from -Range is very good -Looks nice Cons: -Only one colorway Neutral: -Not sure how long the battery life is yet. Been using for 2 and a half weeks so far. -Not sure if its weather proof. (The bell button) (Hasn't been rain yet)
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Great Quick & Easy Doorbell
customer_reviews.text: Put in batteries, select your tune, and stick it up by your door. Offers a wide selection of sounds, put one receiver in the living room and one in the bedroom. Chose a long tune (Darling Clementine), so if I'm in another room and it rings, it will still be playing when I come out to see if I really heard it ringing. Can't ask for much more from a simple doorbell.
customer_reviews.author: Oogmuk

customer_reviews.title: Very Highly Recommended !!! Durable, Reliable , Weatherproof & Excellent Range !!!
customer_reviews.text: After trying a couple of other units that proved to be flimsy and unreliable purchased this one over a year ago and can give it the highest recommendation on all counts. 2nd receiver is over 80 feet from the doorbell, separated by 2 rooms and a thick brick and clay block wall, and always performs flawlessly. Doorbell has been exposed to a full year of extreme heat & cold and heavy rainfall with no problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: CHARLES L HALL

customer_reviews.title: Good Bell / Takes up MORE THAN 1/2 PLUG OUTLET
customer_reviews.text: Great little bell - partic because there are 2 separate Bells. BUT THEY EFFECTIVELY TAKE UP AN ENTIRE OUTLET - THE DEVICE CROSSES THE MIDLINE OF THE THE OUTLET, THUS BLOCKING ANYTHING ELSE OF SIMILAR SIZE - AND ANY MID-LINE USB PORTS YOU OUTLET MAY HAVE. SO YOU NEED TO DEDICATE AN ENTIRE OUTLET.
customer_reviews.author: C. Mark Burgess

customer_reviews.title: Great for hard of hearing
customer_reviews.text: my friend has a hard time hearing. there is no missing this baby!! i also like the melodies they offer. very fun. thanks whoever came up with this. good job. strongly recommend for those that sleep often and have trouble hearing. i have one receiver on one side of the room and one kit on the other side of the room from the couch he normally sits/rests on. perfect sound.
customer_reviews.author: Cyberwolf

customer_reviews.title: Works great until it doesn't
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these that lasted for about a year and a half until the doorbell button stopped working. Purchased another one that died within 6 months because water got into the doorbell button. They work well when they work, but the battery needs to be replaced pretty often and the waterproofing is really sub-par. These would be great if you install them in a covered area, but otherwise they won't last long.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This door bell is wonderful. I own a Pet grooming business where I work alone by appointments only. I wanted To keep my door locked to protect myself. Covid-19 also is making me have clients call when they’re here which is a hustle. I ordered This taking a chance and it’s been great for week 1 so far. So nice to just have anyone ring the bell to avoid someone coming in and keeping me safe!!!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Hall

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I seldom hear my old doorbell when someone rings it because the receiver is on the other side of the house. This unit is very handy to have. It is easy to install. It comes with 52 melodies. Not all are songs,some are just different sounds. I love the choice that I have made to be my doorbell sound. As long as you have an outlet, you can use this doorbell. You do get two receivers in this package. The doorbell itself is weather resistant. What would have been nice, is to list the Chimes or The Melodies that you can choose from. Having said that, this is a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Jones

customer_reviews.title: Works just as advertised...
customer_reviews.text: Dead simple installation - the poster child for plug & play. Plenty loud - if you can't hear this pair of devices, you need hearing aids. My only complaint is the "tune" my wife insisted on using plays so long, it's still going gangbusters even after opening the front door and trying to talk to the person who disturbed my solitude....
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, Easy Set up, and Works Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This is a great doorbell system which I installed on my front gate. It literally took minutes to set up and install. Plugged the first receiver in and paired the doorbell assembly (no problem and easy). Plugged the second receiver in and paired it easily as well (again, no problem and easy). I used alcohol wipe to prepare black powder coated surface for the pushbutton doorbell piece and it stuck on great. It has already went through heavy rain and has stayed in place and functioned normally. Would definitely recommend this for anyone not wanting to run wires.
customer_reviews.author: Mike McConnell

product_meta.title: Wireless Doorbell, AVANTEK D-3W Waterproof Door Chime Kit Operating at Over 1300 Feet with 2 Plug-In Receivers, 52 Melodies, CD Quality Sound and LED Flash
feature_bullets: LIFETIME WARRANTY: Our AVANTEK wireless doorbell is approved by FCC, CE and RoHS; we provide a lifetime warranty on our door bell and 45-day money-back guarantee from the date of purchase

HIGH PERFORMANCE TRANSMITTER: Ultra-low power consumption; uses a CR2032 lithium battery that boasts 3 year maximum lifespan; IP55 dustproof and waterproof; working temperature ranges from -4 °F-140 °F; withstands various harsh weather conditions
400 M / 1312 FT WIRELESS RANGE: Will not interfere with other equipment in your home or those of your neighbors; ensures that you will never miss any visitors, even if you are several rooms away

52 BEAUTIFUL CHIMES: 40 mm stereo speaker delivers rich and crisp sound; press the Next or Previous button to easily choose from 52 melodies; 5 adjustable volume levels, with a maximum volume of 115 dB; enjoy pleasant melodies whenever someone rings at your door
MEMORY FUNCTION: Preserves your last set melody and volume level after a power outage; no need to reset to your previous settings; convenient and easy to use design for a better user experience
EASY TO SET UP: Can add more AVANTEK RW-1 receivers for increased coverage; includes 2 screws, 2 anchor plugs, 1 key and 1 adhesive patch for easy installation of transmitter

specifications.Special Features: Preserves your last set melody and volume level after a power outage, The transmitter is IP55 dust-proof and water-resistant, 52 optional melodies; easy to choose between next and previous, Uses a CR2032 lithium battery that boasts 3 year maximum lifespan, Provides a massive 400 m wireless distance range, Working temperature ranges from -4 °F-140 °F
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars4,145 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
